entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
